name: Input-textarea-animation
tagline: The great input/textarea animation to follow the content or font size. Just try it.
body:
# Input Textarea Animation
The great input/textarea animation to follow the content or font size. Just try it.

### How to use:
```javascript
$('.my-textarea').inputTextarea();
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
